name: politico
text: A vote by the RNC to leave the party’s 2016 party platform unchanged ahead of the election has infuriated grass-roots activists — including moderates who wanted to streamline its message & social conservatives who sought added language on hot-button topics https://t.co/QqEEasuME9

name: politico
text: Twitter permanently removed more than 32,000 accounts linked to three distinct operations attributed to China, Russia and Turkey violating the platform's manipulation policies, the social media company said Friday https://t.co/czmqiRKd8V

text: He also announced plans to build “safety and opportunity and dignity” by increasing access to capital for minority-owned small businesses and confronting health care disparities in communities of color https://t.co/gXlGSaqBrj https://t.co/ghHBYwdnUS

name: politico
text: As many as 13 Chicago police officers broke into Rep. Bobby Rush’s Chicago campaign offices to lounge on chairs, drink coffee and make popcorn while looters vandalized nearby businesses in the wake of the killing of George Floyd https://t.co/1KOXrLhHFj https://t.co/ldEQrYaQiD
